level.text: An applicant shall be exempt from any other certification requirements if the applicant demonstrates in its Application that the applicant or its affiliate:
Has at least three (3) years of experience providing telecommunications services pursuant to authorization(s) by the FCC or a state regulatory body; and
Derived more than $50 million in gross annual revenue from telecommunications services in the year immediately preceding the year in which the Application is filed.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 2601 (April 14, 2000).
